page.title: 06EVENTS IN & AROUND MILLAND
page.content: all kinds of events take place all over the area, but the largest must be the show jumping ans cross-country events at stocklands riding school. there is a big indoor school and several outdoor showgrounds and riders of the higest calibre come to compete. the grounds are occasionally let for other exhibitions and rallies. there is a steam collection at hollycombe which includes roundabouts and a small railway and is open to the public on bank holidays and sundays in the summer.every church organises a summer fete or christmas bazaar to help its funds, as do other organisations such as schools,clubs and village halls. they also hold jumble sales, and this year an auction. the horticulture society has an annual flower show, and there is a gymkhana, and a week of organised activity for the children.
